resources.string:
The custom path needs to omit the external storage directory and fill in the complete path, such as: Pictures/

It is also compatible with wildcard characters in SQL statements:
_ - Replaces only one character;
% - Replaces one or more characters;
[charlist] - Replace any single character in the character list;
[^charlist] or [!charlist] - Replace any single character not in the character list;
If you need to match _ and %, you can add a backslash (\\) in front of them. If you need to match \\, you need to enter \\\\

Click here to view a more detailed tutorial
Not getting manage external storage permission
Query the path of the image
Whether to close this application after deleting the picture
If you do not close it, you can continue to delete pictures.
Whether to allow direct deletion by tapping the delete button (this option does not affect long press deletion and multi-select deletion)
Number of recent images in a single search
The default is 10, leaving it blank or filling in 0 represents the default value.
You need to omit the external storage directory, such as: Pictures/. You can also search for pictures starting with a certain string in a certain directory, such as: DCIM/sc
Only Android 11 and above need to enable this permission

"Delete Recent Pictures" is an application specifically designed to view and delete recently stored pictures on Android devices (hereinafter referred to as devices), helping users conveniently delete recent picture files that are no longer needed in the device. In order to ensure the security of user's image data, this application will not access the Internet. This privacy policy is an integral part of this application.

1.Information description：
This application does not connect to the Internet and does not collect any private information from any user. This app will not destroy the data security of the device, nor will it actively delete or share images.

2.Permission description：
This application only uses permissions to read external storage, write external storage, and manage external storage. If the application does not obtain the above permissions, it will not be able to provide any services.

3.Changes to Privacy Policy：
We reserve the right to modify this policy. If we need to adjust this privacy policy, we will release a new privacy policy following the new version of the "Delete Recent Pictures" application.

4.Open source instructions：
This application is open source. If you need it, you can find the source code of this application in Settings -> About -> Access this project on github.
Refresh successfully and return to the first picture
Unable to obtain picture information, deletion failed
You can undo a picture that was deleted by mistake. When automatic shutdown is enabled, it cannot be revoked
Unable to obtain external storage location, replace with default query
